text: “kanna oona unahama kabaragoyath thalagoya wenawa” upamawe anik paththa dan uwamana nam “nokanna oona unahama dhanawadayath wadawasamwadaya wenawa” yanuwen dan awashya nam wenas kara gatha haka.
mage raththaranta polisiya mama idiripitadi poluwalin gahala uda thattuwata adagena gihilla bimata thallu kala.
pahala adhikarana winisuruwarun thula athi thawath masiwillak wanne, ihalin pamina agawinisuru dhurayata pathwannanta pahala adhikaranawala winisuruwarun ‘windina duka’ prayogikawa notherena bawaya.
ema pariganakaya soragath pudgalaya athadanguwata ganima...

eheth maranayata muhuna dimata ohu thula kisidu chakithayak nowu athara maranaya thamanta, sadadaraniya anarkali ha ekwana pinisa dwaraya wiwara kirimak lesa salaku ohu, udakma maranaya balaporoththu wiya.
piris mahatha ee bawa sandahan karanne meseya.
hina dakinna kalin nidaganna.
ese nowanne nam obage diwiye winashaya kedinakada yana waga obatawath sitha gatha nohaki ayurin sidu wanu atha.
eya ohuta tharamaka lajjawak yayi mata sithina.

ipadima in iwarayi.

goma ekathu kirima.

ee anuwa ‘gami diriye’ samagiya dedarumata lakwi atha.
samariya pradeshiya madin itha keti magak thibunath eya manga hara digu mangakin an pradesha kara gaman kaleya.
oon aaye mama aawo..

1 hashorhi raja wu jabin me siyalu de asu wita, madonhi raja wu jobabta da shimronhi rajuta da aakshaphi rajuta da 2 uthuru dishawe kandu rate saha kinnerothta dakunen thibena araba samabhumiyehi pahatha rateth, basnahiren thibena dor kandukarayehith siti rajawarunta da paniwudayak yawwe ya. 3 thawada, nagenahiren saha basnahirenuth wisu kananiwarunta da amoriwarunta da hiththiwarunta da perissiwarunta da kandu rate wisu jebusiwarunta da mishpa deshayehi hermonta pahalin wisu hiwiwarunta da paniwuda yawwe ya. 4 ewita owhu muhudu werale wali men itha wishala jana sanbyawak wana thamange siyalu senawan samanga paminiyo ya.
amme wanara wikrama dakkakal...

thrasthawadaya walakwime panatha gana ohu sampurna waradi thorathuru idiripath kala bawath me thorathuru sawadya bawa eksath jathinge wishesha niyojithayata thama pahadili kara dun bawath rajapaksha mahatha kiweya.

kese wethath shri lanka aarakshaka ansha pokuru bomba bhawitha kala bawata kisidu sakshiyak nomathi bawath, 'shri lankawa kisi dineka pokuru bomba bhawitha kara nomathi bawa saha idiriyedi da bhawitha nokarana bawa shri lanka rajaye sthawaraya yayi badada pawathi kabinat thirana danumdime madhya hamuwedi prakashayata pathwiya.

ese nowuna hoth jathyantharayata me ratata kada pana mahinda rajapaksha mahatha kudala gena yana thanata mowun katayuthu karanu athi bawa dan nam hondata ma pahadili ya. 1815 sinhale raju kudala gena yana thanata katayuthu kala udarata prabhuwaru ada wipakshaye pamanak nowa aanduwe da sitithi.
jiwathwa sitiyadi obata apaya daka gatha nohaka.
ithin mama ahuwa ayi me rakiyawa thoragaththe kiyala.
usas sahithya nirmanayak wuwath ganenne ebandu ganayatayi.
norwe agamathi kiweya.
palamu githaya (bas eke - ulale la)
me nithi gena enne ayidayi obath sitha balanna.
ohu paha wasara shishyathwaya samathwi nalandawata aa sisuweki.

piriminda kanthawange lingikathwaya sambandhayen athi ruchi aruchikam saha aakalpa gana awabodhayak nomathiwa thamange wuwamanawangana pamanak sitha katayuthu kirimen wiwaha jiwitha,sabandatha kelawara wana thanata pamine.
hamoth ekkama ekamuthuwen hiti kridakayek.
nihanda muhunu samuhayak me mura kulunu deke pihiti ee wiwarawalin da, pawuru mura attala mathin da, gal palame sita da owun desa ebikam karannata wuha.
arunalu wadasatahane atham kotas idiriyedi jathika rupawahiniye aruma puduma roda hathara saha swadhina rupawahiniye wenasa wadasatahan walin wikashaya wimata niyamithaya.
eeth me sare ehema tharka karana pasubimaka neweyi mama hitiye.
eeta hethuwa meya obata pamanak nowa bahuthara yuwathiyanta thibena panayak nisa.
kathawa aththa kiyala dan pahadiliyi ….
owunge pawule wideshiya wathkam pilibandawa nagunu prashnayedi aya pakisthanaya thula menma jathyanthara washayenda warthamanaya wana wita katha bahata lak wu charithayaki.

mema perahara sadaha aarambhaye sitama rajya anugrahaya labi thibenawa.
ee dawantha nishpadanayak mana nimawakin yuthuwa parisamapthiyata path kirimen ya.
welanda pole bahulawa athi
ee gamana mu aaye nahen andanna thiba gaththalu " huh, niyanak dunne, mokadda meken athi wade atha koluwak nathiwa" kiyala.
mata nam nikam pissu wage.podikale indalama mama oowata hondata hurupurudu wela hondatama samajagatha welayi inne.

mema gatumwalata pradhana washayen madiwi thibenne aliyo nagarayayi.
eyata hethuwa dewani anshuwe adala dishawa dige bamuma da palamu anshuwe adala dishawa dige bamuma manina wita ma sakaswima ya.
china rate da mesema daruwanta shilpa shasthra dharma nithi bala kalaye patan ma uganwanu labe.dambaadiwa da yuropiya ratawala da ese ma yi.
ese manawa himikam kawunsilaya magin ella kerena chodana saha eeta adala siyalu yojana prathikshepa kirima hewath pilinoganima itha wadagath mulika upaya mar gika praweshayaki.

ethanin eliyata bassama kama kada godayi.

aa pitathwimata pera mage kakulak asala wu yakada watehida gatagasimatada amathaka nokalaya.ekata gata gasu mage dath mudawa ganimata itha thadabala uthsahayak gath namuth eya galawa gatha nohaki ayurin pitupasata kara gatagasa thibuni.jiwathwime aasawan athhara ma banda thabu yakada watata heththu wimi.mage sakkuwa thula wu china durakathanaya mage angata thadiwini ee samagama upan adahasak nisa waha nagisitagath ma dadi uthsahayakin pasuwa eya sakkuwen pitathata ganimata samath wimi.bhawithayata gatha nohaki aakarayen bindi thibunada me mara ugulin galawimata athi ekama aayudhaya meya bawa mata pasak wannata wiya.bala durakathana nipadawima gana chinnunta dos nagamin sitiyada me mohothe ma hada pathulinma chinnunta sthuthi karannata wuye dosha sahithawa nipadawana lada durakathanayak ma galawaganime meheyumata ek wu nisayi.dewarak pamana bima atharagath pasu durakathana paripathaya galawagath mama haki ikmanin durakathana sangnya nikuth karana chipayata adala paripathaya kandu karawa ganimata samath wimi.

ee anuwa ejapa maha lekam dhurayata amathya akila wiraj kariyawasam, sabhapathi dhurayata amathya kabir hashim, niyojya nayaka dhurayata amathya sajith premadasa, upa nayaka dhurayata parlimenthu manthri rawi karunanayaka, bhandagarika dhurayata amathya harsha da silwa, jathika sanwidhayaka dhurayata amathya nawin disanayaka, jana sanniwedana lekam dhurayata amathya harin pranandu, wruththiya samithi lekam dhurayata ajith pi.
